MacroOp.Name: OMNI_ARCH_MOTOROLA_68K
MacroOp.Brief: Defines a Motorola 68k processor architecture was detected.
MacroOp.Considerations: Architecture detection via preprocessor flags is not always guaranteed as they can be explicitly defined by a user. Take care when relying on these macros to determine architecture specifics.
MacroOp.Synopsis:
If compilation happens on an architecture (or with a compiler) with certain preprocessor flags, this macro is defined.
See @h omni/defs/arch.hpp @h for which flags enable this option.
